entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
